title: An Act establishing a commission on the status of children and youth

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Lovely, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 157) of Joan B. Lovely for legislation to establish a commission on the status of children and youth.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 05/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on Senate Ways and Means
the committee on Senate Ways and Means
